title: Russell Drysdale
creator_credit: Dahl Collings, Collings Productions and Qantas Airways
brief_description: Shows the development of Australian artist, Russell Drysdale, over a period of 25 years and interprets his vision and concept. The film is based on over eighty paintings assembled from private and public collections. Suitable for upper secondary level.
